episodes.title: The Psychology of Cults with Ashlen Hilliard
episodes.description:
Just wrapped one of the most eye-opening conversations I’ve had on the show.

Ashlen Hilliard, cult interventionist and creator of The Psychology of Cults
, joined me in the studio for a no-holds-barred deep dive into the mindset, manipulation, and madness of cult dynamics—past and present.

We broke down:
-Why “good” people join cults
-The devastating stories of Heaven’s Gate and Jonestown
-How cults evolve in real time—including ones you’ve never heard of
-The psychological hooks behind belonging and belief
-How to self-examine your own community dynamics
-What to do if you think someone you love is in one

This was more than a conversation—it was a mirror. Chilling, compassionate, and necessary.

🎙️ Our full episode drops October 16th
🎟️ If you’re in West Virginia, Ashlen will be LIVE at the Clay Center in Charleston TOMORROW (October 18th) as part of her national Psychology of Cults tour. Get ticket info here: psychologyofcults.com/events

Creepalachia was started and will remain as a show diving into the dark, strange, unknown, tragic, and heroic stories of J.D. 's homeland. These hills have stories. LONG LIVE APPALACHIA!

Are you an Appalachian with a creepy experience to tell? Email us at creepalachia@gmail.com and tell us all about it. We could possibly get you on the show!
